Remark.en: Grand Avenue Condominium & Hotel is situated on just under 11 rai of prime city-centre land behind Avenue Shopping Mall on Soi 15, the project is just minutes away from Pattayaโ€s numerous bars, restaurants, shopping centres and beaches.nnThe project will consist of a luxury 4 Star Hotel and six additional condominium buildings with luxury swimming pools, ponds, waterfalls, fitness centres and spas.nnCondominium: 788 Rooms (6 Buildings)nHotel: 200 RoomsnLocation: Central Pattaya
